name: Pika Adventure
description:
Portuguese: Esse jogo foi feito como parte de um pequeno projeto para minha aula de programação. Ele tem apenas três fases, sinto muito! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

English: This game was made as part of a small project for my college programming class. It has just three stages and it's in Portuguese, sorry about that! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Most of the sprites were custom made by JoshR961 for Spriters-Resource.com
Pokémon™ is owned by Nintendo, Creatures Inc., Game Freak and The Pokémon Company.
